snippet: The New York City Ballet will go back to a two-week season at the Saratoga Performing Arts Center in 2015.
abstract: The New York City Ballet will go back to a two-week season at the Saratoga Performing Arts Center in 2015.

headline.main: City Ballet to Add a Week to Its Saratoga Residency
headline.print_headline: City Ballet to Add a Week To Its Saratoga Residency
